content: plain granny square for floral collection introduction thank you for choosing my plain granny square for floral collection pattern i ve made every effort to ensure the instructions are clear and easy to follow but if you have any questions feel free to send me a dm enjoy the process and don t forget to explore my other creations at https //madebylisek art/hello/ for the latest updates and behind-the-scenes glimpses follow me on social media pattern details required materials estimated time 0 5 h this tutorial yarn / cord difficulty 1/5 crochet hook scissors terminology needle us colors yarn and hook suggestions my patterns are designed to be compatible with any yarn and hook size please consider the differences in size and structure when choosing different materials below are the details of the yarn and hook i used and about the final item colors yarn & hook final size yardage background - green material yarnart macrame cotton - width 15 cm / 5 9 in grams 35g 2mm height 15 cm / 5 9 in yardage 35 yds hook 3 5 mm metrage 30 m blo/tlo/flo wrong side right side tlo - third blo - back loop only loop only flo - front loop only invisible join 1 cut the yarn and pull the loop to make one string pull the cut yarn through the loop and insert the hook in the first loop of this round 2 pull the yarn to the other side 3 insert the hook into the last chain back loop only and pull the yarn to the other side weave in the rest of the yarn 4 overview from the top hey there i m anna a 29-year-old crochet enthusiast and designer for the past two years i ve been hooked on crochet for three years now with a special love for 3d structures coasters and amigurumi 2 plain granny square symbols abbreviations mc - magic_ring fptc - front-post treble_crochet tlo - third loop only* single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain blo - back loop only* half_double_crochet - half-double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch flo - front loop only* double_crochet - double_crochet space - space ij - invisible join* tc - treble_crochet rs - right side *described on p 2 ws - wrong side written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain double_crochet tc double_crochet 3 x3 tc double_crochet slip_stitch blo total 16 round 2 single_crochet chain chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet in the next stitch x3 chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 double_crochet in the next stitch x2 slip_stitch blo total 16 chains not included round 3 single_crochet into chain space chain double_crochet into chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x3 double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x3 slip_stitch blo total 32 chains not included round 4 single_crochet chain double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 fptc chain
